item.title: Learning SQL
item.description: I’ve been using the past few weeks to improve my SQL fluency, and I just wanted to share a few quick resources that I’ve found useful. SQLZoo. The quizzes and questions hit the perfect balance of challenging but not so hard that it breaks my sense of flow. The sqlite3 package for Python and RSQLite package for R. While one certainly could install and use something like PostgreSQL on their laptop (and it’s definitely a useful tool to learn!
